{"id":895627948,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 week, 3 days","timestamp":1676072003,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/895627948/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Happy Number","memory":"39 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public boolean isHappy(int n) {\n        int slow = n;\n        int fast = n;\n        do {\n            slow = getNext(slow);\n            fast = getNext(getNext(fast));\n            if (fast == 1) {\n                return true;\n            }\n        } while (slow != fast);\n        return false;\n    }\n    \n    public int getNext(int n) {\n        int totalSum = 0;\n        while (n > 0) {\n            int digit = n % 10;\n            n = n / 10;\n            totalSum += digit * digit;\n        }\n        return totalSum;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"happy-number","has_notes":false}
